description: Crafted for those who push their limits in unforgiving alpine environments and developed in tandem with alpine guide agency partners, this 3-layer GORE-TEX PRO pant offers highly breathable, lightweight, packable protection when the objective demands moving quickly and treading lightly. 40-denier GORE-TEX PRO fabric provides undeniable protection when the going gets tough, and breathes easy when the pace picks up.
name: Mountain Hardwear Dawnlight GTX PRO Pants, Reg - Mens
